poemsDataJson.list_full: 朝(あさ)ぼらけ 有明(ありあけ)の月(つき)と 見(み)るまでに 吉野(よしの)の里(さと)に 降(ふ)れる白雪(しらゆき)
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: At the break of day,//Just as though the morning moon//Lightened the dim scene,//Yoshino's village lay//In a haze of falling snow.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Asa-borake|Ariake no tsuki to|Miru made ni|Yoshino no sato ni|Fureru shira-yuki
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: よしののさとに ふれるしらゆき
poemsDataJson.author: 坂上是則(さかのうえのこれのり)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 有明の月のように明るく降り積もる吉野の雪の清さ
